original_text: And they gathered themselves together against Moses and against Aaron, and said unto them, Ye take too much upon you, seeing all the congregation are holy, every one of them, and the Lord is among them: wherefore then lift ye up yourselves above the congregation of the Lord?
korean_text: 그들이 모여서 모세와 아론을 거슬러 그들에게 이르되 너희가 분수에 지나도다 회중이 다 각각 거룩하고 여호와께서도 그들 중에 계시거늘 너희가 어찌하여 여호와의 총회 위에 스스로 높이느냐

sentences.original_text: Ye take too much upon you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 너무 많은 것을 차지하려 한다

sentences.original_text: seeing all the congregation are holy
and the Lord is among them
wherefore then lift ye up yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 어째서 너희 자신을 높이려 하는가

sentences.original_text: above the congregation of the Lord?
